about_the_game:
Mojin Returns is an adventure treasure hunt game, officially authorized by Tianxia Bachang. Zhang is also the author of a series of works such as Ghost Blows series, Eagles and Youngster and Mojin Ghoul series. The game integrates various elements such as tomb exploration, mystery-solving, and treasure hunting. Eccentric and bizarre traps, magical and mysterious “Zongzi” (corpses in tombs), as well as stories hidden in this underground world, are all ready for you. You will step into the fantastical world portrayed by the author and create your own glorious Mojin Age.

Taking you to experience the original classic plot

The Game makes every effort to recreate the strange world under the pen of Tianxia Bachang. Not only the intrenching tool, Chinese Fengshui mysteries equipment and other props, but also the crisis-ridden, well-mechanized classic plot scenes are all elaborately designed and represented in front of your eyes. Here, you will find nature’s mystery in the ruins of ancient times, and embark on your own journey of a mysterious and thrilling adventure.


Understanding the nature’s mystery to uncover the secret of life

Each tomb exploration journey uncovers not just ancient tombs but the closed history and human nature. What awaits you on this journey, treasures or traps? Historical truth buried in the dust or a deadly mechanism beneath the heavy coffin? It's all up to you to find the answer. Exploring the vast underground world, every unknown corner is a test of life and death.


Switching your profession freely among eight major factions, each having their own strengths

As the protagonist of the Game, you have the flexibility to switch professions at will, learning different specialties and skills. The Tianxing Fengshui skill mastered by the Mojin faction, the violence-bearing skills mastered by Yuling faction, the art of slaughter perfected by the Banshan faction…perhaps these professional skills are your only hope of survival in critical moments.

Adventuring together in life and death with Mojin iron triangle

Lighting a candle in the southeast corner, the iron triangle’s figures gradually become clear. Bayi Hu, who is proficient in Feng Shui mysteries, Pangzi Wang with accurate marksmanship, and the calm and smart Shirley Yang are all your companions. Unity brings life, separation brings death, the journey of tomb raiding and mystery-solving officially begins.

Constructing a home for yourself to have a place to return between dense forests

In the uninhabited wilderness, clear a piece of wasteland, build brick by brick with your own hands, and create a unique survival paradise for yourself. But be careful to defend against uninvited guests such as fierce wolves and leopards, as well as ill-intentioned fellow. Whether to construct mechanisms or engage in close combat? what strategy will you adopt to defend your home? It’s all up to you!
